displayName.text: Gotham Martial Arts - Taekwondo / Tae Kwon Do

formattedAddress: 328 E 61st St 3rd Floor, New York, NY 10065, USA
adrFormatAddress: 328 E 61st St 3rd Floor, New York, NY 10065-8766, USA

originalText.text: Gotham Martial Arts is a friendly environment that provides Taekwondo for all levels. The facility is clean and the staff is very friendly. The instructors are enthusiastic and are always willing to take the extra step to help students grasp concepts being taught and they will work with you to ensure you have a great experience. My 10 year old son, Blake has been rising through the ranks since the age of 7 and he really loves the instructors and has a great time in class! He’s a giant ball of energy, and Headmaster Kwok along with all the instructors are so kind and encouraging! They have really helped him focus and channel his energy in a healthy and positive way. It is a great place to develop physical and mental discipline. My son’s confidence has grown tremendously as a result of Gotham Martial Arts! We highly recommend it ❤️

My 10 year old son, Blake has been rising through the ranks since the age of 7 and he really loves the instructors and has a great time in class! He’s a giant ball of energy, and Headmaster Kwok along with all the instructors are so kind and encouraging! They have really helped him focus and channel his energy in a healthy and positive way. It is a great place to develop physical and mental discipline. My son’s confidence has grown tremendously as a result of Gotham Martial Arts! We highly recommend it ❤️

originalText.text: I have been learning Practical Wing Chun under Sifu William Kwok for two and a half years. The school has a very strict and structured curriculum. I came to Gotham Martial Arts without any formal training or practicing martial arts but progressed so much ever since. All the instructors here are amazing! Master Kwok is a natural instructor who dedicates his life to teaching martial arts and promoting its culture. His commitment to ALL students’ successful trainings is unparalleled. Learning Practical Wing Chun also had a profound impact on my personal growth. Gotham Martial Arts is the go-to place if you are looking to learn martial arts.

originalText.text: Master Kwok is a strict teacher but also an exemplary role model. And my son adores and respects him. Under Master Kwok's mentorship and teaching, my son has become physically and mentally stronger. I think that's very different from other TKD schools. I'd strongly recommend GMA!

text.text: Master Kwok is a strict teacher but also an exemplary role model. And my son adores and respects him. Under Master Kwok's mentorship and teaching, my son has become physically and mentally stronger. I think that's very different from other TKD schools. I'd strongly recommend GMA!

originalText.text: My 7 years old son has been with Gotham Martial Arts for half a year. He really enjoys going to the Taekwondo class. The kids are learning Taekwondo but also learning being kind, discipline, focus and corroboration with other kids. The class also helps him calm down (he is a naughty boy, lol). My son moved one level up within the half a year (thanks to Mr. Kwok) and he is so happy and proud of himself, and further motived to go to the class more often. Unfortunately we need to move to NJ and need to find a new Taekwondo place which I hope (figures crossed) can be as good as Gotham so my son can continue Taekwondo. I highly recommend Gotham to all my friends! And thanks to Mr. Kwok's coaching.

originalText.text: My 4-year-old son began the Little Heroes program at Gotham Martial Arts 3 months ago. Through the wonderful instruction of Master Kwok he has progressed and learned so many skills that are important for young children. His listening, focus, coordination, and strength have improved dramatically. My son always looks forward to his lessons and is so proud of himself when he has mastered a new skill. Thank you Master Kwok for being such an amazing instructor!
